===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|つね}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=つね}}.  Appears in the ''{{w|Man'yōshū}}'', compiled around 759 CE.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>  May be [[cognate]] with {{m|ja|綱|tr=tsuna||thick rope; binding}}, with underlying ideas of {{m|en|connection}}, {{m|en|continuance}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|つね|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|恒}}

====Adjective====
{{ja-adj|infl=na|つね}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=つね|obsolete}} [[eternal]], [[permanent]], [[consistent]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=つね|obsolete}} [[normal]], [[everyday]], [[regular]], [[usual]], [[ordinary]]

=====Usage notes=====
This appears as an adjective in older texts with the classical [[attributive]] form ''tsune naru''.  When used attributively in modern Japanese, this term is used with the particle {{m|ja|の|tr=no}} instead:
* {{ja-usex|'''常'''の人|'''つね''' の ひと|'''everyday''' people, '''regular''' people}}
Modern Japanese does still use this term as an [[adverb]], with particle {{m|ja|に|tr=ni}}:
* {{ja-usex|このカメラは'''常に'''オンになっている。|^この カメラ は '''つね に''' オン に なって いる。|This camera is '''always''' on.}}
* {{ja-usex|あの会社はサービスが'''常に'''悪い。|^あの かいしゃ は サービス が '''つね に''' わるい。|That company has '''consistently''' bad service.}}

=====Synonyms=====
{{sense|normal, usual}}
* {{ja-r|普段|ふだん}}
* {{ja-r|普通|ふつう}}
* {{ja-r|平素|へいそ}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|つね}}

# [[constancy]], [[continuance]]
# the [[ordinary]], the [[everyday]]

===Etymology 4===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|とこ}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=とこ}}.  Possibly [[cognate]] with {{m|ja|時|tr=toki||time}}.

The way the term is used in the historical record suggests that this was originally a noun.  By the time of written Japanese, however, this term only appears in compounds, never on its own, and its usage is more as an adjective to modify other nouns.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|とこ}}

====Prefix====
{{ja-pos|prefix|とこ}}

# [[eternal]], [[forever]], [[unchanging]], [[everlasting]]

=====Usage notes=====
Only used in compounds.  Attaches to [[noun]]s and other [[nominal]]s, often (but not always) with the now-obsolete possessive particle {{m|ja|つ|tr=tsu}}.
* {{ja-usex|'''常'''つ御門、'''常'''夏、'''常'''とわ|'''とこ''' つ みかど、 '''とこ'''なつ、 '''とこ'''とわ|the '''eternal''' palace, '''eternal''' summer, '''eternal''' permanence [→ eternity]}}

===Etymology 5===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|とことわ}}
{{IPAchar|/tokotoba/}} → {{IPAchar|/tokotowa/}}

From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=とことわ}}.  Read as ''tokotoba'' until the {{w|Heian period}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

Appears to be originally a compound of {{compound|lang=ja|常|tr1=toko|t1=eternal|pos1=see above|とわ|tr2=towa|t2=permanence, unchangingness|pos2=from earlier {{m|ja|とば}} ''toba''}}.

This latter element is of unclear derivation.  Some sources<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> indicate that ''towa'' as an independent term arose as a contraction of earlier ''tokotoba'', suggesting the possibility that ''toba'' was initially a compound of particles {{m|ja|と|tr=to|pos=adverbial particle}} + {{m|ja|は|tr=wa|pos=formerly ''ba'', even earlier ''pa''; topic particle}}.  However, other sources<ref name="SMK5">{{R:Shinmeikai5}}</ref> describe ''tokotowa'' as an [[intensified]] or [[emphatic]] form of ''towa''.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|とことわ|acc=0|acc_ref=SMK5|acc2=3|acc2_ref=SMK5}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|常とわ}}, {{ja-l|恒とわ}}, {{qualifier|rare}} {{ja-l|永久}}

====Adjective====
{{ja-adj|infl=na|とことわ|hhira=とことは}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=とことわ|archaic|rare}} [[permanent]], [[eternal]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=とことわ|archaic|rare}} [[usual]], [[ordinary]]

=====Usage notes=====
Listed in dictionaries<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref> as a {{m|ja|形容動詞|tr=keiyō dōshi||''-na'' adjective}}.  However, actual usage suggests that this was only used with particle {{m|ja|に|tr=ni}} as an [[adverb]], and never with particle {{m|ja|な|tr=na}} or classical {{m|ja|なる|tr=naru}} as an [[adjective]].  When this appears [[attributively]], it is followed by particle {{m|ja|の|tr=no}},<ref name="SMK5">{{R:Shinmeikai5}}</ref> the usual construction when using a noun to modify another noun.

=====Synonyms=====
* {{sense|permanent, eternal}} {{ja-r|常しえ|とこしえ}}
* {{sense|usual, ordinary}} {{lang|ja|常}} ''tsune'' {{qualifier|see above}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|とことわ|hhira=とことは}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=とことわ|archaic|rare}} [[permanence]], [[eternity]]

=====Synonyms=====
* {{ja-r|常しえ|とこしえ}}

===Etymology 6===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|とわ}}
{{IPAchar|/toba/}} → {{IPAchar|/towa/}}

From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=とわ}}.  Appears in the ''{{w|Tales of Ise}}'', likely dating to the early 900s CE.  Pronounced as ''toba'' until the later {{w|Heian period}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

Ultimate derivation {{unk.|lang=ja|sort=とわ|nocap=1}}.  May be a contraction of earlier ''tokotoba'' (see above),<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> or may have been an independent term used to form ''tokotoba'' as a compound.<ref name="SMK5">{{R:Shinmeikai5}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|とわ|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR,SMK5}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{qualifier|rare}} {{ja-l|永久}}

====Adjective====
{{ja-adj|infl=na|とわ|hhira=とは}}

# [[constant]], [[permanent]], [[everlasting]]

=====Usage notes=====
Listed in some dictionaries<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref> as a {{m|ja|形容動詞|tr=keiyō dōshi||''-na'' adjective}}; other sources<ref name="SMK5">{{R:Shinmeikai5}}</ref> only list this as a {{m|ja|副詞|tr=fukushi||adverb}}.  Historical usage suggests that this was only used with particle {{m|ja|に|tr=ni}} as an [[adverb]], and not with particle {{m|ja|な|tr=na}} or classical {{m|ja|なる|tr=naru}} as an [[adjective]].  When this appears [[attributively]], it is followed by particle {{m|ja|の|tr=no}},<ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref><ref name="SMK5">{{R:Shinmeikai5}}</ref> the usual construction when using a noun to modify another noun.

=====Synonyms=====
* {{ja-r|常しえ|とこしえ}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|とわ|hhira=とは}}

# [[constancy]], [[permanence]], [[everlastingness]]

=====Synonyms=====
